segments.source_content:
---
toc_max_heading_level: 4
slug: /sidebar/items
---
# Sidebar items

We have introduced three types of item types in the example in the previous section: `doc`, `category`, and `link`, whose usages are fairly intuitive. We will formally introduce their APIs. There's also a fourth type: `autogenerated`, which we will explain in detail later.

translations.zh-hant: 我們已在上一節的範例中介紹了三種項目類型：`doc`、`category` 和 `link`，其用法相當直觀。我們將正式介紹它們的 API。還有第四種類型：`autogenerated`，我們稍後會詳細說明。

segments.source_content:
- **[Doc](#sidebar-item-doc)**: link to a doc page, associating it with the sidebar
- **[Link](#sidebar-item-link)**: link to any internal or external page
- **[Category](#sidebar-item-category)**: creates a dropdown of sidebar items
- **[Autogenerated](autogenerated.mdx)**: generate a sidebar slice automatically
- **[HTML](#sidebar-item-html)**: renders pure HTML in the item's position
- **[\*Ref](multiple-sidebars.mdx#sidebar-item-ref)**: link to a doc page, without making the item take part in navigation generation

translations.zh-hant:
- **[文件](#sidebar-item-doc)**：連結至文件頁面，並將其與側邊欄關聯
- **[連結](#sidebar-item-link)**：連結至任何內部或外部頁面
- **[分類](#sidebar-item-category)**：建立一個側邊欄項目的下拉選單
- **[自動生成](autogenerated.mdx)**：自動生成側邊欄片段
- **[HTML](#sidebar-item-html)**：在項目位置渲染純 HTML
- **[\*引用](multiple-sidebars.mdx#sidebar-item-ref)**：連結至文件頁面，但不讓該項目參與導航生成

segments.source_content: ## Doc: link to a doc {#sidebar-item-doc}
Use the `doc` type to link to a doc page and assign that doc to a sidebar:

translations.zh-hant: 使用 `doc` 類型來連結至文件頁面，並將該文件分配給側邊欄：

segments.source_content: Example:

If you use the doc shorthand or [autogenerated](autogenerated.mdx) sidebar, you would lose the ability to customize the sidebar label through item definition. You can, however, use the `sidebar_label` Markdown front matter within that doc, which has higher precedence over the `label` key in the sidebar item. Similarly, you can use `sidebar_custom_props` to declare custom metadata for a doc page.

translations.zh-hant: 如果您使用文件簡寫或[自動生成](autogenerated.mdx)的側邊欄，您將無法透過項目定義來自訂側邊欄標籤。然而，您可以在該文件中使用 `sidebar_label` Markdown 前置資料，其優先級高於側邊欄項目中的 `label` 鍵。同樣地，您可以使用 `sidebar_custom_props` 來宣告文件頁面的自訂元數據。

segments.source_content:
:::note

A `doc` item sets an [implicit sidebar association](./multiple-sidebars.mdx#sidebar-association). Don't assign the same doc to multiple sidebars: change the type to `ref` instead.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

`doc` 項目設定了[隱式側邊欄關聯](./multiple-sidebars.mdx#sidebar-association)。請勿將同一文件分配給多個側邊欄：請將類型更改為 `ref`。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Sidebar custom props is a useful way to propagate arbitrary doc metadata to the client side, so you can get additional information when using any doc-related hook that fetches a doc object.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

側邊欄自訂屬性是將任意文件元數據傳遞至客戶端的有用方式，因此在使用任何獲取文件對象的文件相關鉤子時，您可以獲取額外資訊。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Link: link to any page {#sidebar-item-link}
Use the `link` type to link to any page (internal or external) that is not a doc.

translations.zh-hant: 使用 `link` 類型來連結至任何非文件的頁面（內部或外部）。

segments.source_content: Example:
## HTML: render custom markup {#sidebar-item-html}
Use the `html` type to render custom HTML within the item's `<li>` tag.

translations.zh-hant: 使用 `html` 類型在項目的 `<li>` 標籤內渲染自訂 HTML。

segments.source_content: This can be useful for inserting custom items such as dividers, section titles, ads, and images.

translations.zh-hant: 這對於插入自訂項目（如分隔線、區段標題、廣告和圖片）非常有用。

segments.source_content: Example:
## Category: create a hierarchy {#sidebar-item-category}
Use the `category` type to create a hierarchy of sidebar items.

translations.zh-hant: 使用 `category` 類型來建立側邊欄項目的層次結構。

segments.source_content: Example:
### Category links {#category-link}
With category links, clicking on a category can navigate you to another page.

translations.zh-hant: 透過類別連結，點擊類別可導航至其他頁面。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Use category links to introduce a category of documents.

Autogenerated categories can use the [`_category_.yml`](./autogenerated.mdx#category-item-metadata) file to declare the link.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

使用類別連結來引入一組文件。

自動生成的類別可使用 [`_category_.yml`](./autogenerated.mdx#category-item-metadata) 檔案來宣告連結。

:::

segments.source_content: #### Generated index page {#generated-index-page}

You can auto-generate an index page that displays all the direct children of this category. The `slug` allows you to customize the generated page's route, which defaults to `/category/[categoryName]`.

translations.zh-hant: 您可以自動生成一個索引頁面，顯示該類別的所有直接子項目。`slug` 參數允許您自訂生成頁面的路由，預設為 `/category/[categoryName]`。

segments.source_content: See it in action on the [Docusaurus Guides page](/docs/category/guides).

translations.zh-hant: 實際範例請參閱 [Docusaurus 指南頁面](/docs/category/guides)。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Use `generated-index` links as a quick way to get an introductory document.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

使用 `generated-index` 連結作為快速建立入門文件的方式。

:::

segments.source_content: #### Doc link {#category-doc-link}
A category can link to an existing document.

translations.zh-hant: 類別可連結至現有文件。

segments.source_content: See it in action on the [i18n introduction page](../../../i18n/i18n-introduction.mdx).

translations.zh-hant: 實際範例請參閱 [i18n 介紹頁面](../../../i18n/i18n-introduction.mdx)。

segments.source_content: #### Embedding generated index in doc page {#embedding-generated-index-in-doc-page}

translations.zh-hant: #### 在文件頁面嵌入自動生成索引 {#embedding-generated-index-in-doc-page}

segments.source_content: You can embed the generated cards list in a normal doc page as well with the `DocCardList` component. It will display all the sidebar items of the parent category of the current document.

translations.zh-hant: 您也可以透過 `DocCardList` 元件將自動生成的卡片列表嵌入一般文件頁面。該元件會顯示當前文件所屬父類別的所有側邊欄項目。

segments.source_content:
```md title="docs/sidebar/index.md"
import DocCardList from '@theme/DocCardList';

<DocCardList />
```

```mdx-code-block
<BrowserWindow>

import DocCardList from '@theme/DocCardList';

<DocCardList />

</BrowserWindow>
```
### Collapsible categories {#collapsible-categories}
We support the option to expand/collapse categories. Categories are collapsible by default, but you can disable collapsing with `collapsible: false`.

translations.zh-hant: 我們支援展開/折疊類別的選項。類別預設為可折疊，但您可透過 `collapsible: false` 停用折疊功能。

segments.source_content: To make all categories non-collapsible by default, set the `sidebarCollapsible` option in `plugin-content-docs` to `false`:

translations.zh-hant: 若要預設所有類別不可折疊，請在 `plugin-content-docs` 中將 `sidebarCollapsible` 選項設為 `false`：

segments.source_content:
:::note

The option in `sidebars.js` takes precedence over plugin configuration, so it is possible to make certain categories collapsible when `sidebarCollapsible` is set to `false` globally.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

`sidebars.js` 中的選項會覆蓋外掛設定，因此當全域 `sidebarCollapsible` 設為 `false` 時，仍可讓特定類別保持可折疊。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Expanded categories by default {#expanded-categories-by-default}
Collapsible categories are collapsed by default. If you want them to be expanded on the first render, you can set `collapsed` to `false`:

translations.zh-hant: 可折疊類別預設為收合狀態。若希望首次渲染時即展開，可將 `collapsed` 設為 `false`：

segments.source_content: Similar to `collapsible`, you can also set the global configuration `options.sidebarCollapsed` to `false`. Individual `collapsed` options in `sidebars.js` will still take precedence over this configuration.

translations.zh-hant: 與 `collapsible` 類似，您也可將全域設定 `options.sidebarCollapsed` 設為 `false`。`sidebars.js` 中的個別 `collapsed` 選項仍會優先於此設定。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

When a category has `collapsed: true` but `collapsible: false` (either through `sidebars.js` or through plugin configuration), the latter takes precedence and the category is still rendered as expanded.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

當類別設有 `collapsed: true` 但 `collapsible: false`（透過 `sidebars.js` 或外掛設定）時，後者優先權較高，該類別仍會以展開狀態呈現。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Using shorthands {#using-shorthands}

You can express typical sidebar items without much customization more concisely with **shorthand syntaxes**. There are two parts to this: [**doc shorthand**](#doc-shorthand) and [**category shorthand**](#category-shorthand).

translations.zh-hant: 您可透過**簡寫語法**更簡潔地表達不需過多自訂的典型側邊欄項目。此功能分為兩部分：[**文件簡寫**](#doc-shorthand) 與 [**類別簡寫**](#category-shorthand)。

segments.source_content: ### Doc shorthand {#doc-shorthand}
An item with type `doc` can be simply a string representing its ID:

translations.zh-hant: 類型為 `doc` 的項目可直接用代表其 ID 的字串表示：

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block
<Tabs>
<TabItem value="Longhand">
```

```mdx-code-block
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="Shorthand">
```

```mdx-code-block
</TabItem>
</Tabs>
```
So it's possible to simplify the example above to:

translations.zh-hant: 因此可將上述範例簡化為：

segments.source_content: ### Category shorthand {#category-shorthand}
A category item can be represented by an object whose key is its label, and the value is an array of subitems.

translations.zh-hant: 一個分類項目可以表示為一個物件，其鍵為標籤，值為子項目陣列。

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block
<Tabs>
<TabItem value="Longhand">
```

```mdx-code-block
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="Shorthand">
```

```mdx-code-block
</TabItem>
</Tabs>
```
This permits us to simplify that example to:

translations.zh-hant: 這使我們可以將該範例簡化為：

segments.source_content: Each shorthand object after this transformation will contain exactly one entry. Now consider the further simplified example below:

translations.zh-hant: 每個簡寫物件在轉換後將僅包含一個條目。現在考慮以下進一步簡化的範例：

segments.source_content: Note how the two consecutive category shorthands are compressed into one object with two entries. This syntax generates a **sidebar slice**: you shouldn't see that object as one bulk item—this object is unwrapped, with each entry becoming a separate item, and they spliced together with the rest of the items (in this case, the "Learn more" link) to form the final sidebar level. Sidebar slices are also important when discussing [autogenerated sidebars](autogenerated.mdx).

translations.zh-hant: 請注意兩個連續的分類簡寫如何被壓縮成一個具有兩個條目的物件。此語法生成一個**側邊欄片段**：您不應將該物件視為一個整體項目——該物件會被展開，每個條目成為一個單獨的項目，並與其餘項目（在此例中為「了解更多」連結）拼接在一起，形成最終的側邊欄層級。側邊欄片段在討論[自動生成的側邊欄](autogenerated.mdx)時也很重要。

segments.source_content: Wherever you have an array of items that is reduced to one category shorthand, you can omit that enclosing array as well.

translations.zh-hant: 只要您有一個項目陣列被簡化為一個分類簡寫，您也可以省略該封裝陣列。

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block
<Tabs>
<TabItem value="Before">
```

```mdx-code-block
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="After">
```

```mdx-code-block
</TabItem>
</Tabs>
```
